00027 #ifndef _sch_msg_
00028 #define _sch_msg_
00029 
00030 /*************************************************************************
00031 **
00032 ** Include section
00033 **
00034 **************************************************************************/
00035 
00036 #include "common_types.h"
00037 #include "sch_msgdefs.h"

00039 /*************************************************************************
00040 **
00041 ** SCH command packet structure definitions
00042 **
00043 **************************************************************************/
00044 
00045 /*
00046 ** SCH_SEND_HK_MID, SCH_NOOP_CC, SCH_RESET_CC, 
00047 ** SCH_ENABLE_SYNC_CC, SCH_SEND_DIAG_TLM_CC
00048 */
00055 typedef struct
00056 {
00057     uint8             CmdHeader[CFE_SB_CMD_HDR_SIZE];  
00059 } SCH_NoArgsCmd_t;
00060 
00061 /*
00062 ** SCH_ENABLE_CC, SCH_DISABLE_CC
00063 */
00069 typedef struct
00070 {
00071     uint8    CmdHeader[CFE_SB_CMD_HDR_SIZE];          
00073     uint16   SlotNumber;                              
00075     uint16   EntryNumber;                             
00078 } SCH_EntryCmd_t;
00079 
00080 /*
00081 ** SCH_ENABLE_GROUP_CC, SCH_DISABLE_GROUP_CC
00082 */
00088 typedef struct
00089 {
00090     uint8    CmdHeader[CFE_SB_CMD_HDR_SIZE];          
00092     uint32   GroupData;                               
00095 } SCH_GroupCmd_t;
00096 
00097 
00098 /*************************************************************************
00099 **
00100 ** SCH housekeeping telemetry packet definition
00101 **
00102 **************************************************************************/
00103 
00108 typedef struct
00109 {
00110     uint8    TlmHeader[CFE_SB_TLM_HDR_SIZE];          
00112     /*
00113     ** Command execution counters (ground commands)
00114     */
00115     uint8    CmdCounter;                              
00118     uint8    ErrCounter;                              
00121     uint8    SyncToMET;                               
00124     uint8    MajorFrameSource;                        
00128     /*
00129     ** Messages sent by schedule table processor
00130     */
00131     uint32   ScheduleActivitySuccessCount;            
00134     uint32   ScheduleActivityFailureCount;            
00138     /*
00139     ** Total schedule table slots processed
00140     */
00141     uint32   SlotsProcessedCount;                     
00145     /*
00146     ** The number of times that slots were skipped
00147     ** (not the number of slots that were skipped)
00148     */
00149     uint16   SkippedSlotsCount;                       
00155     /*
00156     ** The number of times that multiple slots were processed
00157     ** (not the number of slots that were processed)
00158     */
00159     uint16   MultipleSlotsCount;                      
00166     /*
00167     ** The number of times that SH woke up in the same slot as last time
00168     */
00169     uint16   SameSlotCount;                           
00173     /*
00174     ** The number of times that a table entry with bad data was processed
00175     ** (the entry previously passed validation but then somehow went bad)
00176     */
00177     uint16   BadTableDataCount;                       
00181     /*
00182     ** The number of tables verified prior to table load
00183     */
00184     uint16   TableVerifySuccessCount;                 
00187     uint16   TableVerifyFailureCount;                 
00190     uint32   TablePassCount;                          
00193     uint32   ValidMajorFrameCount;                    
00196     uint32   MissedMajorFrameCount;                   
00199     uint32   UnexpectedMajorFrameCount;               
00202     uint16   MinorFramesSinceTone;                    
00205     uint16   NextSlotNumber;                          
00208     uint16   LastSyncMETSlot;                         
00211     boolean  IgnoreMajorFrame;                        
00214     boolean  UnexpectedMajorFrame;                    
00217 } SCH_HkPacket_t;
00218 
00219 
00220 /*************************************************************************
00221 **
00222 ** SCH diagnostic telemetry packet definition
00223 **
00224 **************************************************************************/
00225 
00230 typedef struct
00231 {
00232     uint8           TlmHeader[CFE_SB_TLM_HDR_SIZE];   
00234     uint16          EntryStates[SCH_NUM_STATUS_BYTES_REQD/2]; 
00241     CFE_SB_MsgId_t   MsgIDs[SCH_TABLE_ENTRIES]; 
00244 } SCH_DiagPacket_t;

00246 #endif /* _sch_msg_ */
